arts.ttl: Borussia Mönchengladbach and Hoffenheim share spoils in eight-goal thriller
arts.sum: Fabio Chiarodia rises high to head home the opening goal for Gladbach in the fifth minute, setting the tone for a thrilling match. Franck Honorat celebrates after scoring Gladbach's third goal in a stellar performance.

arts.ttl: 4-4 spectacle leaves Gladbach and Hoffenheim disappointed
arts.sum: Gladbach needed a win in order to have a final go at the European places - and Hoffenheim needed a win to secure Bundesliga football for next season. The result leaves both teams disappointed.

arts.ttl: Borussia Mönchengladbach vs. TSG Hoffenheim preview: Fohlenelf look to get back on form
arts.sum: Hosts Borussia Mönchengladbach will aim to keep their slim hopes of European football alive when they welcome Hoffenheim to Borussia Park on Saturday for a crucial Bundesliga clash.
